description:
Hugh is a 35-year-old muscle guy who cuts hair by day and coaches Crossfit by night.
“Those are two pretty different professions!” I said.
“Yeah,” he replied. “But it works for me. I get to be social and creative during the day, and then in the evening I can get aggressive!”
“Do you like to yell at your students?”
“I don’t really yell, but I make sure that they’re doing what they’re supposed to.”
Hugh says he’s straight, but he’s not currently in a relationship.
“I was dating someone for a while,” he said. “It didn’t work out. Now I’m just having fun!”
title: Hugh
